text: Shivnarine Chanderpaul was born 16 August, 1974 at Unity Village, Guyana. He was a West Indies cricketer who played 164 tests scoring 11,867 runs with 30 test centuries, 268 one-day internationals and 22 Twenty20 Internationals. He was captain of the team in 2005 and 2006. He is the father of cricketer Tagenarine Chanderpaul. ==Other websites== * * Extensive profile on The Cricket Monthly * Shiv Chanderpaul's Site Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Guyanese cricketers
title: Shivnarine Chanderpaul
